author: Tony Tobin
method: Bring the chicken or vegetable stock to the boil and turn down to a gentle simmer.  Add the chilli, lemongrass, shiitake mushrooms, soy sauce and sesame oil. Simmer for five minutes, or until the mushrooms are tender. Serve in a bowl topped with the coriander.
ingredients: 300ml/½ pint chicken stock (vegetarians may substitute with vegetable stock),  ½ tsp chilli, chopped,  ½ tbsp lemongrass, finely chopped,  100g/3½oz shiitake mushrooms,  1 tbsp soy sauce,  1 tsp sesame oil,  handful fresh coriander, chopped
